thread.title: Sage Therapeutics Submits New Drug Application To U.S. FDA For Intravenous Brexanolone In The Treatment Of Postpartum Depression

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Sage Therapeutics Submits New Drug Application To U.S. FDA For Intravenous Brexanolone In The Treatment Of Postpartum Depression

organizations.name: treatment of postpartum depression  sage therapeutics inc

text:
Market News  15 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Sage Therapeutics Submits New Drug Application To U.S. FDA For Intravenous Brexanolone In The Treatment Of Postpartum Depression Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - SAGE Therapeutics Inc: 
* SAGE THERAPEUTICS SUBMITS NEW DRUG APPLICATION TO U.S. FDA FOR INTRAVENOUS BREXANOLONE IN THE TREATMENT OF POSTPARTUM DEPRESSION 
* SAGE THERAPEUTICS SUBMITS NEW DRUG APPLICATION TO U.S. FDA FOR INTRAVENOUS BREXANOLONE IN THE TREATMENT OF POSTPARTUM DEPRESSION 
* SAGE THERAPEUTICS - NDA SUBMISSION SUPPORTED BY DATA FROM HUMMINGBIRD PROGRAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
